snippet: Against his former team, Jose Reyes extended his hitting streak to 25 games for the Miami Marlins. “Now I’m starting to feel like me,” he said.
abstract: Miami Marlins defeat New York Mets, 4-2; Marlins shortstop Jose Reyes extends his hitting streak to 25 games, reminding the Mets of what they lost.
lead_paragraph: Against his former team, Jose Reyes extended his hitting streak to 25 games for the Miami Marlins. “Now I’m starting to feel like me,” he said.

headline.seo: Reyes Keeps Hitting, and Marlins Upend Mets
headline.main: Reyes Keeps Hitting, and Marlins Upend Mets
headline.print_headline: Reminded of What They Lost, the Mets Lose
